headline: Special Agent In Charge at Dept. of Homeland Security, Homeland Security Investigations

defaultPosition.companyName: Dept. of Homeland Security, Homeland Security Investigations
defaultPosition.description:
Senior Executive in charge of the New Orleans Area of Responsibility that consists of five states - Louisiana, Arkansas, Mississippi, Tennessee and Alabama - and 250+ Criminal Investigators, Intelligence Analysts and Administrative Support staff.

This staff is responsible for investigating 400 + criminal statues as well as working with State, County and Municipal law enforcement authorities in the investigation of their corresponding criminal statutes.
defaultPosition.title: Special Agent In Charge

positions.title: Special Agent In Charge
Deputy Assistant Director, Investigative Services Division

positions.companyName: DHS, ICE,  Homeland Security Investigations Los Angeles
positions.title: Deputy Special Agent in Charge

positions.description:
Served as the primary liaison between ICE and the various Government entities within Mexico.

Responsible for advising the Director of ICE and all subordinate ICE offices on current political developments within the Republic as they pertained to ICE's mission.
positions.title: Attache, Mexico

positions.description:
Served as the Unit Chief for the Trade Transparency Unit focusing on international money laundering through commercial trade.

Supervised both domestic and international endeavors in support of this program.
positions.title: Unit Chief
